info.name: Ask Your Feed API v1
info.description:
REST API for Ask Your Feed - MVP

A service that ingests X (Twitter) feed posts and provides Q&A functionality using LLM.

**Base URL:** `http://localhost:8080/api/v1`

**Authentication:** Bearer token in Authorization header or session_token cookie

item.name: Authentication & Session

request.description:
Register a new user account with email, password, and X username. Validates X username via twitterapi.io before completing registration.

**Success:** 201 Created

**Error Codes:**
- 400 Bad Request - Invalid input data
- 409 Conflict - Email already registered
- 422 Unprocessable Entity - X username does not exist
- 500 Internal Server Error
- 503 Service Unavailable - twitterapi.io unavailable

Authenticate user with email and password.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 400 Bad Request - Invalid input data
- 401 Unauthorized - Invalid email or password
- 500 Internal Server Error

Terminate user session and invalidate session token.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session

Get current user session information and metadata.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session

item.description: User authentication and session management endpoints

request.description:
Manually trigger feed ingestion. Initiates an immediate feed ingestion run for initial backfill (24h) or manual refresh.

**Success:** 202 Accepted

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 403 Forbidden - Budget exhausted
- 409 Conflict - Ingest already in progress
- 429 Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
- 500 Internal Server Error

query.description: Number of recent runs to return (default: 10, max: 50)

request.description:
Get ingestion status and history including current and recent ingestion runs.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 500 Internal Server Error

Submit a question to LLM and get an answer based on posts from the specified date range.

**Success:** 201 Created

**Error Codes:**
- 400 Bad Request - Invalid parameters
- 401 Unauthorized
- 403 Forbidden - Budget exhausted
- 422 Unprocessable Entity - date_from > date_to
- 429 Too Many Requests
- 500 Internal Server Error
- 503 Service Unavailable - LLM service unavailable

query.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)

request.description:
Get paginated list of user's Q&A interactions, ordered by creation time (newest first).

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 500 Internal Server Error

Get full details of a specific Q&A interaction including complete answer and all sources.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 404 Not Found - Q&A not found or doesn't belong to user
- 500 Internal Server Error

Permanently remove a Q&A message and its associated sources from history.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 404 Not Found - Q&A not found or doesn't belong to user
- 500 Internal Server Error

Permanently remove all Q&A messages and sources for the authenticated user.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 500 Internal Server Error

query.description: Number of items per page (default: 50, max: 200)

request.description:
Get paginated list of X authors that the user is following and whose posts are being ingested.

**Success:** 200 OK

**Error Codes:**
- 401 Unauthorized
- 500 Internal Server Error

Get system health status of the application and its dependencies. Does not require authentication.

**Success:** 200 OK (healthy), 503 Service Unavailable (degraded/unhealthy)
